Package imagingbook.lib.filters

Class GaussianFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • imagingbook.lib.filters.GenericFilter
      • imagingbook.lib.filters.LinearFilter
        • imagingbook.lib.filters.GaussianFilter
  • public class GaussianFilter
extends LinearFilter
    This class implements a 2D Gaussian filter, providing the functionality of GenericFilter and LinearFilter. It also defines static methods for creating 1D and 2D Gaussian filter kernels for other uses.
    Version:
    2020/02/26

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      GaussianFilter​(double sigma)  
      GaussianFilter​(double sigmaX, double sigmaY)  

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static float[] makeGaussKernel1D​(double sigma)
      Creates and returns a 1D Gaussian filter kernel large enough to avoid truncation effects.
      static float[][] makeGaussKernel2D​(double sigma)
      Creates and returns a 2D Gaussian filter kernel large enough to avoid truncation effects.
      static float[][] makeGaussKernel2D​(double sigmaX, double sigmaY)
      Creates and returns a 2D Gaussian filter kernel large enough to avoid truncation effects.

    • Method Detail

      • makeGaussKernel1D

        public static float[] makeGaussKernel1D​(double sigma)
        Creates and returns a 1D Gaussian filter kernel large enough to avoid truncation effects. The resulting array is odd-sized. The kernel is normalized, i.e., the sum of its elements is 1.
        Parameters:
        sigma - the width of the Gaussian
        Returns:
        a 1D, odd-sized filter kernel

      • makeGaussKernel2D

        public static float[][] makeGaussKernel2D​(double sigma)
        Creates and returns a 2D Gaussian filter kernel large enough to avoid truncation effects. The resulting array is odd-sized. The kernel is normalized, i.e., the sum of its elements is 1.
        Parameters:
        sigma - the width of the Gaussian (in both directions)
        Returns:
        a 2D, odd-sized filter kernel

      • makeGaussKernel2D

        public static float[][] makeGaussKernel2D​(double sigmaX,
                                          double sigmaY)
        Creates and returns a 2D Gaussian filter kernel large enough to avoid truncation effects. The resulting array is odd-sized. The kernel is normalized, i.e., the sum of its elements is 1.
        Parameters:
        sigmaX - the width of the Gaussian in x-direction
        sigmaY - the width of the Gaussian in y-direction
        Returns:
        a 2D, odd-sized filter kernel
